title: Wonderful Stay
text: Hotel 414 was wonderful; affordable, clean, convenient location, your own washroom, flat screen TV with loads of cable channels, complimentry WiFi & breakfast. I stayed at a hostel in NYC just 2 months ago and the experience is still haunting, I really appreciate everything Hotel 414 has to offer. (Mind you the hostel costs $170-180 after tax a night which is not much cheaper than 414)I would definitely stay at 414 again and would recommend it to anyone and everyone.
